text:
Hey everybody. Recently I created a <https://www.facebook.com/groups/732402100281543/permalink/1360095874178826|post> in HubSpot Solution Providers Facebook group. I want to have dynamic query strings via Javascript when a form is being submitted. Here is the scenario of what we want to achieve. One of our forms is for warranty claims. Once the form is being submitted we want for each submission the form to assign a contact property a unique warranty number.

Please let me know if any developer wants to help us with this case.
